p: Maria Chironna and Daniela Loconsole conceived and designed the study. Simona Baldacci, Francesca Centrone, Viviana Bruno, and Rosanna Mallamaci performed data collection and management. Anna Lisa De Robertis, Anna Morea, and Daniele Casulli designed and performed the sample testing. Michele Quarto, Maria Chironna, and Marisa Accogli analysed and interpreted the results. Daniela Loconsole and Maria Chironna wrote and edited the manuscript. All authors reviewed the manuscript and approved its final version.
